Define Documentation

#define Apoxi_NiSharedPtr_hpp
 

#define NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
 

Since some ANSI-challenged target compilers do not all support member templates (we would need the templated copy constructor and templated assignment operator) we have to turn off the usage of member templates. This robs the possibility to cast an instance of the smart-pointer to a related instance of another smart-pointer.

Function Documentation

template<typename X, typename Y>
BOOLEAN operator!= (  const NiSharedPtr< X > &  lhs,
const NiSharedPtr< Y > &  rhs
) 
 

Inequality operator for smart pointers of template class NiSharedPtr<>. Returns whether lhs and rhs point to different objects.

template<typename X, typename Y>
BOOLEAN operator== (  const NiSharedPtr< X > &  lhs,
const NiSharedPtr< Y > &  rhs
) 
 

Equality operator for smart pointers of template class NiSharedPtr<>. Returns whether lhs and rhs point to the same object.
